name: Dreamwalker Headpiece
tooltip:
Dreamwalker HeadpieceLevel 60

Rayne at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make a Dreamwalker Headpiece if you bring her the following: 1 Desecrated Headpiece, 15 Wartorn Leather Scraps, 6 Cured Rugged Hides and 2 Nexus Crystals.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Headpiece
- Wartorn Leather Scrap x 15
- Cured Rugged Hide x 6
- Nexus Crystal x 2
